Author: Alright#0419
Content:
ok let me explain what I thought we had agreed on. Please point out pros and cons of the two proposal.

We have a stake holder vote every 2 months. There are 5 options.
remove 2 notaries
remove 1 notary
no change
add 1 notary
add 2 notaries

This vote then determines how many spots are left to the lottery(which requires showing you're capable of notarizing before being entered into lottery)

Author: Alright#0419

Author: Alright#0419
Content: so we start with 20, after 2 months stakeholder vote determines we will add 1. 15 top performing notaries keep their spot. 5 bottom performing have the opportunity to enter the lottery along with any new comers. We would then have 6 spots that would be determined by the lottery
